metadata.name: Base64 Encoded PowerShell Command Detected
metadata.comment: Detects usage of the "FromBase64String" function in the commandline which is used to decode a base64 encoded string

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('::frombase64string(')))

output.summary: Detects usage of the "FromBase64String" function in the commandline which is used to decode a base64 encoded string

metadata.objective: False positive: Administrative script libraries Reference: https://gist.github.com/Neo23x0/6af876ee72b51676c82a2db8d2cd3639
